reviews.review: Buen game! lo unico malo son los chiters
Та ещё хуйня наиграл 1000 часов. Клоака демонов для геев,любителей почекать тёмку так сказатб.Не покупайте прайм всё равно не помогает.И да если забыли то кс та ещё хуйня.

Excelente juego, uno de mis preferidos sin duda alguna.
One of the best fps game i've ever played

Honestly a super fun that can get you feeling really competitive, not to mention all the cool skins and the hilarious in game chat, sometimes it's cool, sometimes it's annoying, but most of the time its just one hell of a ride.
就你这个反外挂技术，建议回蓝翔重修一下基础计算机理论。这游戏现在让我回忆起了10年的CF，飞天哥大战遁地鬼，非常J8平衡
the game is a lot better if you pay for it when its on discount since you wont have to deal with all the hackers in game.
It is very awful, but in the best way 10/10
Yes. 10/10. Best FPS. If you haven't played it, get off console
